name: LETTUCE_EAT
description:
What is Lettuce_Eat

The world is full of big and complex issues like inequality, climatic change, and hunger.

Your mission is to collect all the food and solve world hunger before the timer runs out. 

Use food upgrades to meet unique people.

Can you solve this issue alone?

 

The controls are extremely simple

- AD/left and right Arrow keys to Move

- Space to Jump

     

Special thanks to

The Game was made with a collab between Okker and Emmet.
